Articles.Content:
Hello all, been lurking for a while since around 0.23.5-0.24, finally decided to join up. Great game and from what I've seen a great community. Haven't really got far in the game (Terrible Modaholic, so I constantly break it). Anywho see you around.

Strider Signing Off

Hello CaptainStrider, and welcome to the forums!

It really is a great community, and I'm sure you'll enjoy your time here.

Happy landings!
Welcome fellow human. By reading my location it should become clear were Im from.
Greetings pilot from what will be a very wet Northampton today. Cant wait to finish work, get dried off and fire up KSP!

Long time lurker (about a year?) ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

I've been playing a while too, and still have lots to explore (I like to move slow myself).

Glad to see you join the forums! Welcome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

> 
> Long time lurker (about a year?) ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Yeah well maybe I'm overly cautious, but I don't tend to sign up until I have gleaned enough information so I don't just waltz in like an idiot (hopefully) and whether I think I can add something to the community. Started posting some modding bugs to hopefully nail down issues is a case in point and I may start posting a career playthrough and some point (when I'm happy with my setup as least)

Strider Out

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T12:42:47Z" title="07/26/2015 12:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by CaptainStrider**
